data.title: Gerald Ford
data.meta_description: #1238 Gerald Ford on the 2024 Billionaires - Gerald Ford has been buying distressed banks and turning them around since 1975, when he bought his first
data.text:
Retail Alert – Trump’s Party Is Looking At Your Supply Chain

Flying right in the center of the latest political storm, America’s retail community is on high alert for endangered supply chains.

‘House Of The Dragon’ Season 2, Episode 6 Recap And Review: The Flight Of The Dragonriders

New dragonriders emerge as House of the Dragon nears the end of Season 2.

Deadline Extended For Ford EV Owners To Reserve Free Tesla Charger Adapter

Ford EV owners waiting for free Tesla Supercharger adapters will continue to wait with the official NACS charger deadline pushed from June to the end of August.

Ford Expanding F-Series Truck Production As Electric Vehicle Demand Slows

The automaker estimated losses of up to $5.5 billion from its eclectic vehicle business this year.

Ford Stock Stages A Comeback On F-150 Strength, EV Lull

A bulk of Ford’s gains have come over the last month or so, with the stock rising by almost 20% over the past month.

Cybertruck Rockets To Top Of Price Segment As It Closes In On Ford F-150 Lightning

The Cybertruck is now officially a price segment leader as it races to catch the Ford F-150 Lightning Electric.

F-150 Sales Surge Will Drive Ford’s Q2 Earnings

Ford stock is expected to publish its Q2 2024 earnings in the next few weeks — a quarter that is likely to see sales cool off a bit amid easing consumer spending.

Does Ford’s Triumph At Pikes Peak Translate To On-Road Success?

Ford has made its best-selling vehicle into an electric speed demon. The race variant is far from the workhorse we know and love, but this is the electric future.

The $95,000 Ford Bronco Raptor Does Off-Roading In Style

The Bronco Raptor is the ultimate Bronco, filled with comforts and tuned for comfortable street driving. Wherever your day takes you, on road or off, the Bronco Raptor can, too.

Ford Bronco Raptor: The Ultimate Bronco, And Maybe The Ultimate Raptor

The top-of-the-line Ford Bronco Raptor combines off-road chops with Baja mode, or, sport mode for off-roading, with every day comforts. And it's why it's the one to beat.

How Ford’s Off-Roadeo Sites Are Supporting Veterans And Their Families

Ford shows support for veterans by hosting off-roading events at its Bronco Off-Roadeo sites. Through these events, veterans and their families get "adventure therapy."

Ford Pro Becomes The Engine Pulling Ford Into The Connected Future

Ford Pro has become the vehicle that pulls Ford Motor Co. along, the commercial-vehicle sales and operations unit that now ranks as a nearly $60-billion operation.

Tesla Cybertrucks And Ford F-150 Pickups Affected By Latest Recalls

The automakers have recalled a combined 6 million vehicles so far this year.

Chevrolet Colorado ZR2 Bison Vs. Ford Ranger Raptor: Baja Brawlers

The new 2024 Chevy Colorado ZR2 Bison and Ford Ranger Raptor are the most extreme midsize pickups on the market. Here's how they compare.

Francis Ford Coppola’s ‘Megalopolis’ Lands U.S. Distribution Deal

“Megalopolis”—director Francis Ford Coppola’s self-funded $120 million sci-fi opus—is coming to U.S. theaters. Click in to read more about the deal.
